name: MicroShip - Battleship for Apple Watch
description:
Classic Battleship for Apple Watch, micro version!

* This is a 1-player game, you battle against the watch.

* You have a 2-square ship, the first to hit both the squares with the ship wins!

* When placing your ship, tap twice the same square to turn ship.

* You switch between starting each round. You start first, then the watch, etc.

Enjoy!
